name: Chickpea Kale Soup
description: Think homemade soup is complicated? Uh-uh! It’s as simple as mixing frozen veggies and a can of beans, then bolstering flavour with a flavourful broth. Frozen veggies are healthy and convenient. They’re frozen soon after picking, which helps lock in nutrients. Streamline cooking with  Steamers. These make meals easy: mix, cook, serve and even store leftovers in them.

ingredients.name: Fajita Seasoning or Greek Dressing Mix

preparation: Combine ingredients in a Multipurpose Steamer.
Microwave with lid on for 10–12 minutes, until vegetables are soft.
Very carefully remove from microwave, season to taste, stir, and serve.
Combine ingredients in a Multipurpose Pot and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for 10–15 minutes, until vegetables are soft.
tips: Bump up protein and stir in cooked shredded chicken, frozen shrimp or shelled edamame.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 tbsp feta cheese and a crusty whole wheat roll.
